name: Clients - Update (client_update) → Postgres Direct → Respond

parameters.query:
UPDATE client_finals SET
  nom = COALESCE(NULLIF('{{ $json.nom }}', ''), nom),
  prenom = COALESCE(NULLIF('{{ $json.prenom }}', ''), prenom),
  email = COALESCE(NULLIF('{{ $json.email }}', ''), email),
  telephone = COALESCE(NULLIF('{{ $json.telephone }}', ''), telephone),
  raison_sociale = COALESCE(NULLIF('{{ $json.raisonSociale }}', ''), raison_sociale),
  adresse = COALESCE(NULLIF('{{ $json.adresse }}', ''), adresse),
  updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = '{{ $json.id }}'::uuid
AND tenant_id = '{{ $json.tenantId }}'::uuid
RETURNING id, tenant_id, nom, prenom, email, telephone, type, raison_sociale, adresse, statut, created_at, updated_at

_comment: Converted from HTTP Request to Postgres Direct on 2026-02-21. type and statut removed from UPDATE SET to avoid enum COALESCE mismatch. Tested OK.
